membership: Volvo Car Corporation is a member of ACEA, EUCAR, FEBIAC and other industry related associations such as the Confederation of Swedish Enterprises and AGORIA.
goals__remit: The Volvo Cars European Affairs Office in Brussels focus is to monitor EU policies and legislation relevant to Volvo Car Corporation activities. It cooperates with EU institutions and other associations, providing technical expertise. It represents Volvo Car Corporation in European associations and vis-à-vis other stakeholders in Brussels.
position: Director Government Affairs - Head of EU Office
